text_logic_form: The length of the line $PB$ is $12$.
The length of the line $AB$ is $15$.
The measure of angle $ABD$ is $24$ degrees.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $PB$ is $12$.

line_instances: There are lines $AC$, $AD$, $AB$, $CD$, $CB$, $DB$, forming the rhombus $ABCD$.
The lines $AP$ and $CP$ are diagonals of the rhombus $ABCD$.
